title: App works, but short on refinement
text: If you follow the instructions carefully, the app will work with the Smanos system.  HOWEVER, there is currently no way to have multiple users control the alarms.

title: Great DIY Alarm System
text: At first I was little hard to install the accessories because the booklet does not really tell you how to add them. I had to check online to find out how. But once you know how it is straightforward for all devices. Love the notification and loud siren!

title: Have been very pleased with the W100
text: I have had the W100 now for over three years (actually 2 Year’s) as the first one quit working about 11 months in and smanos sent me a new system. I have added an additional 8 sensors and can’t complain.

title: Please fix the prob, this app crash all the time on iPhone X...
text: Please fix the prob, this app crash all the time on iPhone X...

title: Great app and system!! Update broke app
text:
I rarely write a review.  The system met and exceeded all of my expectations! I had a little trouble setting it up had to reboot my wireless router for whatever reason but that fixed all my problems. I live in a rental house and wanted something non-permanent for an alarm system. I also wanted to get push notifications to my phone this system does all of that it can even call my phone! Very happy customer!

After the update the app does not sync up with my alarm module. I get lots and I do mean lots of intermittent errors. The app only works about 30% of the time now. Please fix this ASAP!

Latest update: fixed all the bugs I was having. Speed has increased! Great job thank you!

title: Connection errors - time out
text: Broken app, 70% of time I am getting time out error, unable to connect to my home alarm system , useless. Sending my W100 system back. Not reliable at all.

title: Broken app, great product
text: This app used to work amazingly well. But now it rarely if ever works after the last update.  Please get this fixed!!  Thanks.
